post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
- Running keeps person in shape. Sex is exciting but doesn't keeps person in Shape
- Running makes person becomes patient Further not faster. Could apply it to practice
- Running forces person to think Running is lonely and time-consuming process. There is nothing else to do than to think
- Running makes person to challenge oneself. If person practices running consistent base, every run person is going to do is challenge. If person has done certain distance once, does not guarantee next time. It will provide better change to achieve it.
- Running makes person humble Depends on the situation and body condition person could do better or worse. Person appreciates a lot more on the small and simple stuffs.
- Running helps person to simplify given tasks Running is very simple process. But there are a lot of factors such as body condition, weather if outside, location, time of the day, before or after meal and etc. Person should make this complicated situation simple as possible.
- More Practice means better results. About other sport you should be the judge.
- One could teach others to become better. Sex could be very personal and private
- Running could be family and group activities for good reason. The other hand sex could be both but it could be queer.
- Running could build person's confidence and self-esteem. Try it and find out
post.title: 10 Reasons why Running is better than Sex
